body: I love the story by Arino Hiroshi about AV girl (page 114) can't wait for full tankoubon

Man, idk why I think Arino Hiroshi's story is giving me NTR-vibes even though I'm fully aware this artist is more vanilla than ever. Not bad on that Azuse's story we got a mini hot springs scene. Finally, the last few page spreads are from a recent Bunnywalker animation, the Imaizumi series, highly recommended: https://hanime.tv/videos/hentai/imaizumin-chi-wa-douyara-gal-no-tamariba-ni-natteru-rashii-1
Uhh this language god is need translate into english
